items.title: OpenAI brings GPT-4o back as a default for all paying ChatGPT users, Altman promises ‘plenty of notice’ if it leaves again
items.description: For now, the changes should help placate users who felt frustrated by the sudden shift to GPT-5 and deprecation of OpenAI's older LLMs.

items.title: The end of perimeter defense: When your own AI tools become the threat actor
items.description: Russia's APT28 tested LLM-powered malware on Ukraine. The same tech that breaches enterprises is now selling for $250/month on the dark web.

items.title: Liquid AI wants to give smartphones small, fast AI that can see with new LFM2-VL model
items.description: Liquid AI has described this license as based on Apache 2.0 principles, but the full text has not yet been published.

items.title: OpenAI adds new ChatGPT third-party tool connectors to Dropbox, MS Teams as Altman clarifies GPT-5 prioritization
items.description: OpenAI is positioning GPT-5 not only as a more powerful AI model but also as part of a more connected workspace.

items.title: Claude can now process entire software projects in single request, Anthropic says
items.description: Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4 now supports a 1 million token context window, enabling AI to process entire codebases and complex documents in a single r...
